naslov: Luksuzna kuća za dugoročni najam s bazenom –  otok Brač (iznajmljivanje)
opis: Iznajmljuje se novo uređena kuća visoke kvalitete s privatnim bazenom i prostranim terasama, smještena u mirnom dijelu mjesta Milna na otoku Braču. Udaljena svega 5 minuta hoda od mora, kuća nudi savršen spoj modernog komfora, privatnosti i mediteranskog načina života – idealna za cjelogodišnji boravak. Osnovne značajke: * Stambena površina: 116 m² * Vanjski prostor: 150 m² terasa, uključujući 30 m² natkrivene terase * Bazen: privatni, s automatskim doziranjem kemikalija i toplinskom pumpom (grijanje/hlađenje) * Parking: 3 privatna parkirna mjesta * Namještaj: kuća je u završnoj fazi opremanja modernim i kvalitetnim namještajem Raspored prostorija: Prizemlje: *Moderna kuhinja s blagovaonicom *Prostrani dnevni boravak s izlazom na terasu i bazen *Kupaonica Kat: *Dvije spavaće sobe, svaka s izlazom na terasu od 30 m² s očaravajućim pogledom na more *Dodatna kupaonica s modernim sanitarijama Dodatne pogodnosti: *Potpuna klimatizacija *Visokokvalitetna gradnja i završna obrada *Mirna lokacija s puno privatnosti *Udaljenost do mora: 5 minuta hoda *Blizina marine, restorana, trgovina i plaža Dostupna za useljenje: od 1. rujna 2025. Najam isključivo na duži period k: +385992438986  mail: antich22@gmail.com ENG: A newly renovated high-end house with a private pool and spacious terraces is available for long-term rent, located in a quiet area of Milna on the island of Brač. Just a 5-minute walk from the sea, this property offers the perfect combination of modern comfort, privacy, and Mediterranean lifestyle – ideal for year-round living. Key Features: * Interior space: 116 m² * Outdoor area: 150 m² of terraces, including a 30 m² covered terrace * Pool: private, with automatic chemical dosing system and heat pump (for heating and cooling) * Parking: 3 private parking spaces * Furnishing: the house is in the final stage of being furnished with modern, high-quality furniture Layout: Ground floor: *Fully equipped modern kitchen with dining area *Spacious living room with direct access to the terrace and pool *Bathroom First floor: *Two elegantly furnished bedrooms, each with access to a 30 m² terrace with a sea view *Additional bathroom with contemporary fittings Additional Amenities: *Full air conditioning *High-quality construction and finishing materials *Quiet location with complete privacy *Only 5 minutes on foot to the sea *Close to marina, restaurants, shops, and beaches Available for move-in: from September 1st, 2025 Long-term rent only k: +385992438986  mail: antich22@gmail.com
